releaseNotes:
Why update to the newest app version if it does not come with new features? Well, even though there are no new features included in this release, it does not mean the app remains the same. Not at all. In fact, you're holding a masterpiece of a parking app where the digital parking experience is being fine-tuned to its peak. We continually optimize our core features such as finding a parking area and starting a parking, so that you have fast, easy & safe experience with us! 



In fact, it is now 5 seconds faster than it was last year to start parking using our app, thanks to the fine-tuning work we have done. *Hurrah!


Don't waste that precious saved 5 seconds on watching funny parking videos in your car, instead unleash yourself from the seat belt and go to explore the city!

Keep updated and keep moving.
description:
At EasyPark, we love cities. And by making parking easier, we believe we’re making urban life easier. Our parking app helps millions of drivers by saving them both time and money, while eliminating the hassles and stress involved with parking in urban areas.

EasyPark is available in over 2200 cities across Europe. Now we cover more countries than any other parking app in Europe - making us the region’s nr. 1 parking app*. We’re changing the way people park for the better. And that means we’re leading the growth of parking technology, and developing new parking services for on-street, off-street, and garage parking.

EasyPark is available in: Berlin, Barcelona, Turin, Hamburg, Hanover, Salzburg, Cologne, Madrid, Rome, Stockholm, Copenhagen, Oslo, Helsinki, Rotterdam and in many others!

Price: For the value we deliver, EasyPark charges a fee on top of the parking cost. Please find more info on the pricing on your local EasyPark website.

EasyPark – Parking made easy.
- Parking payments made on your phone, only touching your screen.
- Account registration takes less than 60 seconds.
- Cashless parking with a wide range of payment options including PayPal and credit cards like Visa & Mastercard. 
- Our FIND navigation helps you locate on-street parking spots.
- Remotely extend the time of your parking session, directly in the app.
- Automatic notifications remind you when your session is about to expire.
- Pay only for the time you park, stop your session early directly in the app.
- Get a business subscription to split personal and job-related parking costs.
- Convenience of a smartphone app saves you time, and reduces stress. 
- Increased control of your parking session helps you to avoid fines.

Visit EasyPark online at: www.easyparkgroup.com
